title: Oscilloscope Rising Edge (Code 400h to C00h)
summary: Oscilloscope screenshot of a smaller code-step transition with zoomed edge residual.

structured_data.description: On-image labels indicate transition from code 400h to C00h, trigger pulse 5 V/div, rising edge 2 V/div, and zoomed edge 100 uV/div. Time base shown as 5 us/div.
